titleStmt.title: The schoole of pollicie: or The araignement of state-abuses Directing magistrates, adorning the court, and beautifying the whole common-wealth.
titleStmt.author: Crosse, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Valentine Sims for Nathanael Butter, dwelling in Paules Churchyard neere vnto Saint Austens gate,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Crosse, Henry. Vertues common-wealth.
With title page and dedication cancelled and cancel title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
